EmailTemplate.name: NDCe.Email 1 - to partner list.02-05-21 BNK NDCe Campaign Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: How FIs Saw 66% Faster Rollout of New Services
EmailTemplate.textOnly: 2020 kicked digital into high gear. And in 2021? Full speed ahead.  It’s time to look closely at your ATM software ecosystem. Because it could be holding you back from delivering the benefits of true digital cohesion for you and your customers. Ask yourself: - Are you dependent on the switch for all your transactions? - Do new developments take months to implement? - Is an outdated UI crippling your customer experience? If yes, then you’ll be surprised at the massive benefits you can realize when you update your enterprise software. Explore our latest article on the top 5 things to know about enterprise software. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> P.S. Early enterprise adopters deployed new services 66% faster than those with non-enterprise applications. This is true agile banking. Read more <[[https://www.ncr.com/blogs/banking/how-enterprise-atm-software-can-transform-your-network-and-future]]>. <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
